item.title: About
item.description: mesonscience is the blog of Ron Bali. Let’s come to the point: Interested in Science, Machine Learning, Systems programming, Mathematics and writing my own compiler Physics is ❤️ Skilled in the C programming language(C99 is the best!), C++, Python, Golang and Flutter. Working on: Polishing up on SKLearn
item.content:
mesonscience is the blog of Ron Bali.

Let’s come to the point:

  • Interested in Science, Machine Learning, Systems programming, Mathematics and writing my own compiler
  • Physics is ❤️
  • Skilled in the C programming language(C99 is the best!), C++, Python, Golang and Flutter.
  • Working on: Polishing up on SKLearn
